titleStmt.title: The panther-prophesy, or, A premonition to all people of sad calamities and miseries like to befal these islands to which is added, an astrological discourse concerning that strange apparition of an army of horse seen in Wales near Mountgomery, December the 20th 1661.
titleStmt.author: Lloyd, Owen.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
